mapper.select: select bid, seq, content, userid, regtime from comment where bid = #{bid} order by seq desc
mapper.insert: insert into comment(bid, seq, content,userid,regtime) values(#{bid}, (select max(tmp.seq)+1 from comment as tmp where tmp.bid=#{bid}), #{content}, #{userid}, now());
mapper.delete: delete from comment where bid = #{bid} and seq = #{seq}
